message.raw:
Fix issue #36: BLACS freezing in IMAQdxCamera continuous acquisition.

* Merged `ImageReceiver.update()` and `ImageReceiver.handler()` and have the
  whole method run in the Qt main thread.

 * Use new zprocess functionality to respond to worker process immediately to
   allow it to begin acquiring the next frame whilst the parent process is
   rendering the previous frame

* Add zprocess version requirement for this functionality.

* Call QApplication.sendPostedEvents() to prevent a backlog of paint events and
  other events that can otherwise build up at high frame rates and have been
  observed to freeze the GUI.
message.html:
Fix issue #36: BLACS freezing in IMAQdxCamera continuous acquisition.

  • Merged ImageReceiver.update() and ImageReceiver.handler() and have the
    whole method run in the Qt main thread.

  • Use new zprocess functionality to respond to worker process immediately to
    allow it to begin acquiring the next frame whilst the parent process is
    rendering the previous frame

  • Add zprocess version requirement for this functionality.

  • Call QApplication.sendPostedEvents() to prevent a backlog of paint events and
    other events that can otherwise build up at high frame rates and have been
    observed to freeze the GUI.

message:
Fix issue #36: BLACS freezing in IMAQdxCamera continuous acquisition.

* Merged `ImageReceiver.update()` and `ImageReceiver.handler()` and have the
  whole method run in the Qt main thread.

 * Use new zprocess functionality to respond to worker process immediately to
   allow it to begin acquiring the next frame whilst the parent process is
   rendering the previous frame

* Add zprocess version requirement for this functionality.

* Call QApplication.sendPostedEvents() to prevent a backlog of paint events and
  other events that can otherwise build up at high frame rates and have been
  observed to freeze the GUI.
